thread.title: Farmer accused of raping 13-year-old niece, gets her pregnant - Nation | The Star Online
thread.title_full: Farmer accused of raping 13-year-old niece, gets her pregnant - Nation | The Star Online

author: Stephanie Lee
title: Farmer accused of raping 13-year-old niece, gets her pregnant - Nation | The Star Online
text:
Saturday, 25 February 2017 | MYT 4:56 PM Farmer accused of raping 13-year-old niece, gets her pregnant by stephanie lee 
KOTA KINABALU: A farmer has been arrested for allegedly raping his niece since she was 13, resulting in her now being pregnant at the age of 15. 
The 57-year-old man, who took care of the girl after her parents divorced 11 years ago, was nabbed after the victim lodged a report in Papar some 40km from here. 
Papar police chief Deputy Supt Nor Azizulkifli Mansor said the girl, accompanied by other family members, lodged a report at about 3.30pm on Feb 23. 
“A team was sent to raid the suspect’s house following the report, and the suspect was arrested at about 5.50pm the same day,” he said. 
He said the victim was believed to have been raped since 2014. 
“The last time he committed the offence was early this year,” DSP Azizulkifli added. 
The victim, said to be 10 weeks’ pregnant, is currently under doctor’s observation at the Papar district hospital. 
Following the raid on the suspect’s house, police also found a homemade gun, locally known as ‘bakakuk’. 
They also found 14 bullets belonging to the suspect’s friend. 
The suspect is now being investigated under two offences, one for statutory rape and the other under the Firearms Act. 
The 62-year-old friend who owns the bullets has also been brought in to allow investigations under the Firearms Act.
